title: PBE
body:
Hey riot,
I signed up for a pbe account and for some reason it did not redirect me to another page to create a username and password to the pbe servers.
I tried to recover my username and password multiple times and no email was sent to the email i entered in.

replies.body: If you weren't taken to the page where you could create a username and password the signup likely didn't finish properly. Try signing up again if you haven't yet and let me know what happened if it still doesn't work.
